intro: Desmos sootepense, commonly known as the Sootep desmos, is a flowering plant native to Southeast Asia. It belongs to the family Malvaceae, which includes cotton and hibiscus. The plant is characterized by its soft, hairy leaves and showy, pinkish-white flowers that bloom in clusters. It thrives in moist, shaded environments and is often found in tropical rainforests. Due to habitat loss, it is considered a vulnerable species in its native range.
